00012 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_SOCKET
00013 #include <sys/socket.h>
00014 #endif
00015 #ifdef HAVE_NETINET_IN
00016 #include <netinet/in.h>
00017 #endif
00018 #ifdef HAVE_NETINET_TCP
00019 #include <netinet/tcp.h>
00020 #endif
00021 #ifdef HAVE_SYSUIO
00022 #include <sys/uio.h>
00023 #endif
00024 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00025 #include <netdb.h>
00026 #ifndef NO_UNIXSOCK
00027 #include <sys/un.h>
00028 #endif
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #ifdef OS_WIN
00032 #include <windows.h>
00033 /* #include <winsock.h> not compatible with ws2tcpip.h */
00034 #include <winsock2.h>
00035 #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #ifndef HAVE_IN_ADDR_T
00039 typedef unsigned long in_addr_t;
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #include <stdio.h>
00043 #include <u/missing.h>
00044 #include <u/toolbox/uri.h>
00045 #include <u/toolbox/misc.h>
00046 
00047 #ifdef __cplusplus
00048 extern "C" {
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #define U_NET_BACKLOG 300
00052 
00053 /* The Net module defines the following (private) URI types: 
00054  *    {tc,ud}p[46]://<host>:<port> for TCP/UDP over IPv[46] addresses,
00055  *    unix://<abs_path> for UNIX IPC endpoints. 
00056  * Internally, they are translated into an u_net_addr_t structure. */
00057 struct u_net_addr_s
00058 {
00059     enum { 
00060         U_NET_TYPE_MIN,
00061         U_NET_TCP4,
00062         U_NET_TCP6,
00063         U_NET_UDP4,
00064         U_NET_UDP6,
00065         U_NET_UNIX,
00066         U_NET_TYPE_MAX
00067     } type;
00068     union
00069     {
00070         struct sockaddr_in  sin;
00071 #ifndef NO_IPV6
00072         struct sockaddr_in6 sin6;
00073 #endif
00074 #ifndef NO_UNIXSOCK
00075         struct sockaddr_un  sun;
00076 #endif /* OS_UNIX */
00077     } sa;
00078 };
00079 
00080 typedef struct u_net_addr_s u_net_addr_t;
00081 
00082 /* socket creation semantics: server or client (the 'mode' in u_net_sock) */
00083 enum { U_NET_SSOCK, U_NET_CSOCK };
00084 
00091 #define u_net_write(sd, buf, nbytes, nw, iseof) \
00092     u_io((iof_t) write, sd, buf, nbytes, nw, iseof)
00093 
00095 #define u_net_read(sd, buf, nbytes, nw, iseof) \
00096     u_io(read, sd, buf, nbytes, nw, iseof)
00097 
00099 #define u_net_writen(sd, buf, nbytes) \
00100     u_io((iof_t) write, sd, buf, nbytes, 0, 0)
00101 
00103 #define u_net_readn(sd, buf, nbytes) \
00104     u_io(read, sd, buf, nbytes, 0, 0)
00105 
00111 /* hi-level socket creation */
00112 int u_net_sock (const char *uri, int mode);
00113 int u_net_sock_tcp (u_net_addr_t *addr, int mode);
00114 int u_net_sock_udp (u_net_addr_t *addr, int mode);
00115 #ifndef NO_UNIXSOCK
00116 int u_net_sock_unix (u_net_addr_t *addr, int mode);
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 /* low-level socket creation */
00120 int u_net_tcp4_ssock (struct sockaddr_in *sad, int reuse, int backlog);
00121 int u_net_tcp4_csock (struct sockaddr_in *sad);
00122 #ifndef NO_IPV6
00123 int u_net_tcp6_ssock (struct sockaddr_in6 *sad, int reuse, int backlog);
00124 int u_net_tcp6_csock (struct sockaddr_in6 *sad);
00125 #endif
00126 #ifndef NO_UNIXSOCK
00127 int u_net_unix_ssock (struct sockaddr_un *sad, int backlog);
00128 int u_net_unix_csock (struct sockaddr_un *sad);
00129 #endif
00130 
00131 /* address translation: uri string -> u_uri -> u_net_addr -> struct sockaddr */
00132 int u_net_uri2addr (const char *uri, u_net_addr_t **pa);
00133 int u_net_uri2sin (u_uri_t *uri, struct sockaddr_in *sad);
00134 #ifndef NO_UNIXSOCK
00135 int u_net_uri2sun (const char *uri, struct sockaddr_un *sad);
00136 #endif /* OS_UNIX */
00137 
00138 /* u_net_addr */
00139 int u_net_addr_new (int type, u_net_addr_t **pa);
00140 void u_net_addr_free (u_net_addr_t *addr);
00141 
00142 int u_net_nagle_off (int sd);
00143 
00144 #ifdef __cplusplus
00145 }
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 #endif /* !_U_NET_H_ */
